packInfo.name: warbler-pack-core
packInfo.description: Core conversation templates for essential NPC interactions
packInfo.author: TWG Team

templates.title: Friendly Greeting
templates.description: A warm, welcoming greeting for friendly NPCs
templates.content: Hello there, {{user_name}}! Welcome to {{location}}. It's a beautiful {{time_of_day}} today, isn't it?

templates.title: Formal Greeting
templates.description: A polite, formal greeting for official NPCs
templates.content: Good {{time_of_day}}, {{user_title}}. I am {{npc_name}}, {{npc_role}} of {{location}}. How may I assist you today?

requiredSlots.name: npc_role
requiredSlots.description: Role or position of the NPC

templates.title: Friendly Farewell
templates.description: A warm goodbye for friendly interactions
templates.content: It was great talking with you, {{user_name}}! Safe travels on your journey. May you find what you seek!

templates.title: Formal Farewell
templates.content: Thank you for your visit, {{user_title}}. Should you require further assistance, please do not hesitate to return.

templates.title: General Help Offer
templates.content: Of course! I'd be happy to help you, {{user_name}}. What specifically can I assist you with today? I know quite a bit about {{location}} and the surrounding area.

templates.title: Trade Welcome
templates.content: Ah, a fellow trader! You've come to the right place. I have {{item_types}} available for trade. What interests you, or perhaps you have something to sell?

requiredSlots.name: item_types
requiredSlots.description: Types of items available for trade

templates.title: General Conversation
templates.content: That's interesting. {{location}} has seen many travelers like yourself. Each one has their own story to tell. What brings you to our {{location_type}}?

requiredSlots.name: location_type
requiredSlots.description: Type of location (town, village, city, etc.)

templates.title: Unknown Response Handler
templates.description: Fallback for unclear or unrecognized input
templates.content: I'm not quite sure I understand what you mean. Could you perhaps rephrase that? I want to make sure I can help you properly.
